title: Door To Door Maniac 1961 ★★½: Johnny Cash [1:15:18] Excellent Quality

sources.title: Door To Door Maniac 1961 ★★½: Johnny Cash [1:15:18] Excellent Quality
sources.description: Five Minutes to Live/Door To Door Maniac is a 1961 neo-noir crime film directed by Bill Karn. The film stars Johnny Cash, who wrote and sang the title song, and Cay Forrester, who wrote the screenplay and whose husband, Ludlow Flower, produced. Plot: As his partner in crime, Fred Dorella (Vic Tayback), heads to the bank and tries to extort cash from executive Ken Wilson (Donald Woods), Johnny Cabot (Johnny Cash) kidnaps Wilson's wife, Nancy (Cay Forester). Fred tells Ken that, unless he hands over $70,000 in cash, Johnny will kill Nancy. Ken comes up with a ploy to buy some time for the police to assess the situation. Though the scheme is coming unstuck, Fred and Johnny aren't about to go quietly.
